languages.text: Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each time the wearer uses a major psychic power, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用主要{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，其{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的所有敌人都会失去30%的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用主要灵能力量时，其{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的所有敌人都会损失30%的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。

languages.text: Когда персонаж применяет значимую {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g}, все противники в его зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} теряют 30% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж применяет значимую психосилу, все противники в его {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне видимости{/g} теряют 30% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.

Когда персонаж применяет значимую психосилу, все противники в его {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне видимости{/g} теряют 30% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.

languages.text: 使用者が主要な{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使うたび、その{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}にいる敵すべてが、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}の30%を失う。
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が主要な超能力を使うたび、その{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}にいる敵すべてが、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}の30％を失う。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador usa un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} mayor, todos los enemigos en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} pierden el 30 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} hasta que comience el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador usa un poder psíquico mayor, todos los enemigos en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} pierden el 30 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} hasta que comience el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger eine primäre {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} nutzt, verlieren alle Feinde in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers 30 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jedes mal wenn der Träger eine primäre psionische Kraft nutzt, verlieren alle Feinde in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} 30 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} majeur, tous les ennemis situés dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} perdent 30 % de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir psychique majeur, tous les ennemis situés dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} perdent 30 % de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir psychique majeur, tous les ennemis situés dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} perdent 30 % de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

languages.text: Giyen kişi her büyük {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kullandığında, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunan tüm düşmanlar {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerlerinin %30'unu kaybederler. Bu etki, giyen kişinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başlayana dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
